quiz.text: As per the information shared, ‘Mission Integrated Biorefineries’ has been jointly launched by the India and which of the following countries?
options: Netherlands
Finland
United Kingdom
France
Germany

quiz.text: Which of the following countries are core member of ‘Mission Integrated Biorefineries’?
options: Brazil, USA
Brazil, Canada
USA, Canada
Brazil, United Kingdom
United Kingdom, Canada

quiz.text: Target of ‘Mission Integrated Biorefineries’ is to replace __________ of fossil based fuels, chemicals and materials with bio-based alternatives by 2030.
options: 6%
8%
10%
12%
14%

quiz.text: JALDOOT app has been jointly developed by Ministry of Rural Development and __________.
options: Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Jal Shakti
Ministry of Panchayati Raj
None of the Above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is not correct with regards to JALDOOT app?

A. Manual monitoring of water levels in open wells will be measured once in a year.

B. Jaldoots should upload the geo-tagged photographs through the app on every occasion of measurement.

C.  Jaldoots are the officers assigned to measure the water levels.
options: A only
A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: ‘Swachh Toycathon’ has been launched by _________.
options: Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Jal Shakti
Ministry of Panchayati Raj
None of the Above

quiz.text: Knowledge partner for above mentioned initiative is Center for Creative Learning, __________.
options: IIT Bombay
IIT Madras
IIT Gandhinagar
IIT Jodhpur
IIT Roorkee

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), National Conference of Ministers of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEF&CC) has been conducted. As per information shared during the conference, _________ initiative has been launched to reduce the time taken for granting Environment and Forest clearances.
options: PARAMARSH
PRATIVESH
PARIVESH
PARISTITHI
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Home Minister has approved the release of how much amount as central share of the State Disaster Mitigation Fund (SDMF) to the three States of Uttar Pradesh, Punjab and Goa for the year 2021-22?
options: Rs. 458 crore
Rs. 488 crore
Rs. 468 crore
Rs. 478 crore
Rs. 498 crore

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), the active vacancies on the National Career Service (NCS) portal have reached an all-time high. This portal was launched in ________ as a one stop solution that provides a wide array of employment and career related services.
options: 2014
2015
2016
2017
2018

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following banks has acquired over 5.5% stake in ONDC for Rs 10 crore?
options: Bank of India
SBI
PNB
ICICI Bank
HDFC Bank

quiz.text: Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC) is an initiative of ________.
options: NITI Aayog
DPIIT
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Home Affairs

quiz.text:
Which of the following is/are the correct statements regarding ONDC?

A. Objective is to democratize and decentralize e-commerce

B. Aim is to raise e-commerce penetration in next 2 years to 25% of India’s consumer purchases

C. Aim is to sign up 500 million buyers within next 5 years
options: A only
A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities has signed a Tripartite MoU with Skill Council for Persons with Disabilities and Amazon Seller Private Limited to jointly provide skill training and employment opportunities for persons with disabilities in __________.
options: E-commerce sector
Services Sector
Manufacturing Sector
Designing Products
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Ministry of Commerce & Industry has released the analysis of the India-United Arab Emirates (UAE) Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) for the period of June-August 2022, excluding oil trade statistics. CEPA was signed with an aim to increase the total value of bilateral trade in goods to over USD __________ within 5 years.
options: 100 billion
110 billion
120 billion
130 billion
140 billion

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has reduced its real GDP forecast for FY23 to ___________.
options: 6.5%
7.0%
7.2%
7.5%
7.7%

quiz.text: As per Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), which of the following factors are influencing GDP Predictions?
options: Extended Geopolitical Tensions
Tightening Global Financial Conditions
Possible decline in the external component of aggregate demand
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Ministry of Commerce & Industry has extended the Foreign Trade Policy (FTP) 2015-2020, for __________, w.e.f. 1st October, 2022.
options: 2 months
3 months
4 months
6 months
9 months

quiz.text:
Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Foreign Trade Policy (FTP) 2015-2020?

A. It provides a detailed framework for increasing exports of goods and services

B. It envisages employment generation & increasing value addition of goods and services

C. In line with ‘Make in India’ vision of Prime Minister of India
options: A only
A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 10th Brazil, Russia, India, China & South Africa (BRICS) meet of Science & Technology Ministers has been conducted. As per information shared during meeting, how much budget has been allocated for creation of National Research Foundation (NRF)?
options: Rs 4,500 crore
Rs 5,000 crore
Rs 5,500 crore
Rs 6,000 crore
Rs 7,000 crore

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following initiatives has been announced by Union Minister of Science and technology at the first-ever CSIR (Council of Scientific & Industrial Research) Leadership Meet to showcase the technological breakthroughs and innovations in the each of 37 CSIR laboratories/institutes across the country?
options: One Week One Lab
One Month One Lab
One Year One Lab
One Day One Lab
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of Development of North Eastern Region has launched ‘SymphoNE: A Virtual Conference’. This conference was organised to boost _________ in North East Region.
options: Food Sector
Service Sector
Tourism Sector
Agriculture Sector
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), central government has formed a five-member committee to consider a "legally enforceable" mechanism for regulating the marketing practices of pharmaceutical firms. Who among the following has been appointed as Chairperson of this committee?
options: Amitabh Kant
V K Paul
Balram Bhargava
Lav Agarwal
Rajesh Bhushan

quiz.text: Vitamin Angels India has partnered with ___________ to address under-nutrition in India.
options: UNICEF India
Ministry of Rural Development
Oxfam India
Ministry of Women and Child Development
None of the Above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, Poshan Innovation Platform initiative is to be launched in ___________.
options: March 2023
April 2023
January 2023
November 2022
December 2022

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, which of the following states has topped in the country by developing 8,462 lakes (Amrit Sarovars) under the Mission Amrit Sarovar?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Kerala
Rajasthan
Jharkhand
Madhya Pradesh

quiz.text: Mission Amrit Sarovar has been launched to develop and rejuvenate __________ water bodies in each district of the country.
options: 25
50
75
100
125

quiz.text: Technical Partner for the Mission Amrit Sarovar is __________.
options: ISRO
NIC
BISAG-N
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: India Cooling Action Plan (ICAP) has been launched in which of the following years?
options: 2014
2015
2016
2019
2018

quiz.text: Time period of India Cooling Action Plan is __________.
options: 20 years
18 years
16 years
14 years
12 years

quiz.text: One of the targets under India Cooling Action Plan is to reduce cooling energy requirements by __________ by the target year.
options: 25% to 30%
25% to 40%
30% to 45%
35% to 50%
45% to 60%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), who among the following has been appointed as the Executive Chairman of National Legal Services Authority (NALSA)?
options: Justice Adarsh Kumar Goel
Justice S K Singh
Justice Sudhir Agarwal
Justice Swatanter Kumar
Justice D.Y. Chandrachud

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 4th India-CARICOM Foreign Ministers’ meeting has been held at New York, United States. Caribbean Community (CARICOM) was established in _________.
options: 1998
1982
1965
1961
1973

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following states has become the first state in the country to launch an encyclopedia on tribal communities to document their age-old and unique traditions?
options: Odisha
Kerala
Rajasthan
Jharkhand
Madhya Pradesh
